contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox University |name = Owensboro Community and Technical College |image = |established = 1986 |type = Public, 2 year |president = James S. Klauber, Sr. |city = [[Owensboro, Kentucky|Owensboro]] |state = [[Kentucky]] |country = [[United States of America|USA]] |colors = Blue PMS 541 <span style="color:#003366;">█</span> and Gold PMS 131 <span style="color:#FFCC33;">█</span> |affiliations = [[Kentucky Community and Technical College System]] |website = [http://www.owensboro.kctcs.edu http://www.owensboro.kctcs.edu] |logo = }} '''Owensboro Community and Technical College (OCTC)''', located in [[Owensboro, Kentucky|Owensboro, KY]], is one of 16 two-year, open-admissions colleges of the [[Kentucky Community and Technical College System]] (KCTCS). KCTCS was formed in 1999 from the consolidation of all the community colleges formerly under the University of KY system. Owensboro Community College (est. 1986) and Owensboro Technical College (est. 1929) consolidated to become OCTC. OCTC is accredited by the [[Southern Association of Colleges and Schools]] (SACS) to offer technical as well as [[associate's degree]] programs. == Service area == The primary service area of OCTC includes: * [[Daviess County, Kentucky|Daviess County]] * [[Hancock County, Kentucky|Hancock County]] * [[Ohio County, Kentucky|Ohio County]] * [[McLean County, Kentucky|McLean County]] * [[Spencer County, Indiana|Spencer County]] ([[Indiana]]) ==Campuses== OCTC maintains three campus locations (Main Campus, Downtown Campus, Southeastern Campus and a Hancock County Center in Lewisport, KY), all in [[Kentucky]]. Main Campus is located at 4800 New Hartford Road Owensboro, KY 42303 ==External links== *[http://www.owensboro.kctcs.edu Owensboro Community and Technical College Home Page] *[http://www.kctcs.edu Kentucky Community and Technical College System Home Page] {{Kentucky Higher Education}} {{coord missing|Kentucky}} [[Category:Kentucky Community and Technical College System]] [[Category:Owensboro, Kentucky]] [[Category:Universities and colleges in Kentucky]] [[Category:Educational institutions established in 2005]] [[Category:Universities and colleges accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools]] [[Category:Education in Daviess County, Kentucky]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in Daviess County, Kentucky]] {{Kentucky-university-stub}}
